enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: In the decision (FCCC/SBI/2004/L.15/Add.1), the COP, inter alia, requests the Executive Secretary to submit to SBI the proposed budget for 2006-7, and to explore options to protect funds of the UNFCCC and the Protocol against the adverse effects of exchange-rate fluctuations and to report on this issue to SBI-22.
